# Multiple Choice (10 points)

*Circle the best answer. 2 points each.*

## 1. Sample Variance [2 pts]

Which statement correctly describes the formula below?

$$s^2 = \frac{\sum(X_i - \bar{X})^2}{n-1}$$

a) Sum of deviations
b) **Average squared deviation, divided by n−1**
c) Square root of sum of squares
d) Range divided by 2

::: {.solution}
The sample variance divides by n-1 (degrees of freedom) to provide an unbiased estimate.
:::
